ComicInfo.Summary: Zealot is working deep undercover, trying to find out the mystery General Gant is keeping from the world. Just as she discovers that Gant has possession of Helspont's space ship, the base is attacked by the alien D'rahn. As the rest of Wildcore decide whether or not to come to Zealot's aid, she finds herself in hot water as the aliens tear through Gant's forces and reveal him to be a Daemonite in disguise.
